description.p: Compute the count of the rows that satisfy the expression or all rows Count(*).
A numeric field, expression, or the value *. COUNT(*) will count all rows in the query.
Returns the count of the rows that satisfy the expression or all rows (Count(*)).

discussion.p: The Count function counts the rows that satisfy the expression or all rows returned by the query.

example.caption: Count() function executed on the Northwind Access database: counts all rows in the Orders table.
